topics.body:
......Ugghhhhhhh....
Verdict: boring to the point that I'm struggling to stay awake and probably going to go to sleep soon.


This is why I don't listen to you guys cause as a someone that's barely in the anime fandom a lot of the manga that gets suggested to outsiders just seem kind of boring.  No I'm not going to read the entire manga; no I'm not going to watch the anime: I just thought it was boring so I'm going not going to read any farther cause I have no interest in doing so and no matter how many times someone will tell me to read the entire thing I'm just not interested.  How boring did I think the manga was?  I'm about to slip into a fucking coma over here.

Inb4 someone throws a tantrum cause I didn't like it.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

<<pretty much bored

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551273e46368727dcee80100#post_551273e46368727dcee80100
At least you tried it.
topics.author: 4fdef063945b700a9d01604f

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551273e46368727dcee80100#post_551273e46368727dcee80100
I don't give a shining *FUCK*. Thats perfectly ok. 

What matters is you read it and you are saying this based on your opinion and not on just assumption from what you heard from other people. 

Seriously that's all I honestly wanted you to do. Especially since you convinced trash to probably buy ZOE 2 which he was saying he didn't want to play for the exact reasons of overhyped. But you told him to anyway.

AND HE WAS GOING TO BUY IT WITH HIS OWN MONEY. 

Now you don't look like a hypocrite (Of course I say that with no disrespect) for not giving it a chance first. because now you hate it based on what _you_ read and based on what _you_ saw. And I feel that's fair For the people you have recommended stuff too. 

Now go into your little Coma knowing you actually read it. And I'm glad to have wasted your time! 
!http://setfreefromtheic.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/black-woman-attitude.jpg!
And I'll see yo ass next week. 

Also before you ask no I'm not mad. I'm _happy_ that you at least gave it a try. :)

So thank you for at least reading it.

And I agree its not for everyone but you at least tried it. And that's all that matters. 

And now to be fair what do you recommend for me? Go ahead! Give me anything!
